title: Events
body:
Events¶

Events keeps a record of all events, current/upcoming and past, that have been organized by a program of your organization.

  1. Click the in the ribbon

  2. Click Events

  3. Click Events

  4. Click :icon:`calendar`**Upcoming Events** to view events currently happening and events that are scheduled to occur in the future

  5. Click :icon:`clock-o`**Past Events** to view events that have ended

  6. Click and Clone event to make a duplicate of an event

  7. Click on an event to view an event and all information associated with the event, registration, tickets, etc.

    • To edit the event, click here
